questions: What is the meaning of the name aspect?
What is the Vn for the name aspect?
Which aspect has a Vn of vn?
Which category is the name aspect in?

data.name: Retrospective
data.desc: The formative happened in the past.

data.name: Prospective
data.desc: The formative will happen in the future.

data.name: Habitual
data.desc: The formative be happening.

data.name: Progressive
data.desc: The formative is in progress.

data.name: Imminent
data.desc: The formative is about to happen.

data.name: Precessive
data.desc: The formative has just happened.

data.name: Regulative
data.desc: The formative be happening from the past into the future.

data.name: Summative
data.desc: The formative has already happened.

data.name: Anticipatory
data.desc: The formative has yet to begin happening.

data.name: Resumptive
data.desc: The formative continues after having previously stopped.

data.name: Cessative
data.desc: The formative stops.

data.name: Pausal
data.desc: The formative stops, but will resume.

data.name: Regressive
data.desc: The formative returns to its original state after a change to a different state.

data.name: Preclusive
data.desc: The formative happens all at once without stopping.

data.name: Continuative
data.desc: The formative keeps on happening.

data.name: Incessative
data.desc: The formative continues without stopping.

data.name: Experiential
data.desc: The formative happens at some point.

data.name: Interruptive
data.desc: The formative is halted in the middle of its occurence.

data.name: Preemptive
data.desc: The formative happens for once and at last.

data.name: Climactic
data.desc: The formative happens for the last time.

data.name: Dilatory
data.desc: The formative happens after having been long delayed in happening.

data.name: Temporary
data.desc: The formative happens for the time being.

data.name: Expenditive
data.desc: The formative happens all the time in an all-consuming manner.

data.name: Limitative
data.desc: The formative happens just in time.

data.name: Expeditive
data.desc: The formative happens in a hurry.

data.name: Protractive
data.desc: The formative happens with no particular rush.

data.name: Preparatory
data.desc: The formative happens in advance of a future situation.

data.name: Disclusive
data.desc: The formative turns out to have happened.

data.name: Conclusive
data.desc: The formative ends up happening (in the short term).

data.name: Culminative
data.desc: The formative ends up happening (over the long term).

data.name: Intermediative
data.desc: The formative happens somewhere along the way of another formative.

data.name: Tardative
data.desc: The formative happens during a time period over which it reduces in intensity.

data.name: Transitional
data.desc: The formative begins to happen (over the long term).

data.name: Intercommutative
data.desc: The formative happens in reciprocation of a similar event.

data.name: Motive
data.desc: The formative happens in a way that removes its participants from discourse.

data.name: Sequential
data.desc: The formative happens as a series of identical instances that comprise a larger unit.
